text: Jorge "Jordi" Llopart Ribas (5 May 1952 â€“ 11 November 2020) was a Spanish race walker. He competed in the 50 km event at the 1980, 1984, and 1988 Olympics. He won a silver medal in 1980. He was a European champion in this event in 1978. Llopart was born in El Prat de Llobregat, Spain. Llopart died on 11 November 2020 in Badalona, Spain from a heart attack, aged 68.Jordi Llopart, legendary Spanish walker, Olympic runner-up in 1980 and European champion in 1978, dies ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Racewalkers Category:Spanish athletes
title: Jorge Llopart
